snippet.title: Fallen Legion - First Glimpse | PS4
snippet.description:
Get a glimpse of Fallen Legion's real-time combat system! Players take control of up to four different characters and battle ferocious monsters.

While clashing with rebel armies, you must make split second decisions on how to rule your kingdom. Will you side with the mercenary Prime Legion, palatine Council of Princes or cabalistic March Congress? Find out more at www.fallenlegiongame.com.

*First glimpse of Fallen Legion. This video is from an early development version.

http://www.fallenlegiongame.com

May contain content inappropriate for children, visit www.esrb.org for rating information
